title: Bajaj Auto appoints Dinesh Thapar as chief financial officer
description: Bajaj Auto Ltd on Tuesday said it has appointed Dinesh Thapar as its chief financial officer. Thapar joins Bajaj Auto from Reliance Retail where he was group chief financial officer for the past three years, the company said in a statement.
